topics.name: Contiguous Allocation
topics.explanation: Each process occupies a single continuous memory block.

topics.name: Paging
topics.explanation: Memory is divided into fixed-size pages and frames.

topics.name: Segmentation
topics.explanation: Memory divided into logical segments like code, stack, data.

topics.name: Virtual Memory
topics.explanation: Allows execution of programs larger than physical memory.

topics.name: Page Replacement - LRU
topics.explanation: Least Recently Used page is replaced.
